mdRecord.dcterms:description: Baseball player statuette at north door

Founded in 1896, St. George's School is an independent boarding and day school with an Episcopal heritage welcoming students from grades 9 - 12. Set atop a lush 25 acres overlooking Sachuest Beach in Middletown --http://middletown.patch.com/listings/st-georges-school-8 [work]
